text: <!here|@here> as of friday evening I think there may be a change in plans.  Iâ€™m working to clarify today.

<!here|@here> change of plans confirmed.  TLDR
The current idea for WLF is too big and too-high potential to constrain to this year's festival time and budget parameters

Accordingly, they'd like to re-use last year's Wayfinding Towers for this year.  There are some hardware/equipment failures that ZGF knows about that they've requested help with as well as opportunity to iterate on the animation if we'd like this year
- I'll get more info on that, in a parallel thread with Robert

*We won't be meeting this Wednesday.  The larger group likely won't get together until next year*

<@U0XJFPSRL> to our discussion earlier, the new idea still exists, just likely on a different timeline/budget for a different set of venues.  So synthesizing your convo with Megan is still valuable thought just lower priority.
thanks for riding the wave with me  :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U02F8LF2X> if we were to use the existing towers; what do you want me to inquire about?  I have a list ut am curious what jumps to top of mind for ya
I guess enumerating and detailing the things they want to improve on or change
the connectors are the big thing for me (and probably miguel since he shared the pain of plugging and unplugging them in the driving rain and cold multiple times)
also understand what some of the hardware failures they know about are
yep going through what failed or was finicky would be useful
some of the stuff may be easy to address, some not
i know we had chatted about other ideas for animations - interested in trying some?
